message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed session: PSU banks led gains (UNIONBANK, IDBI), defence steady (BEL, HAL), while FMCG/consumption and select IT (DABUR, VBL, MPHASIS) were weak. Portfolio closed +2.02% with BEL and BSE strong; maintain a selective buy-on-strength approach into Monday.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "signal": "Buy breakout > 106.5",
      "reason": "Wide bullish candle and strong close after testing 107; continuation above 106.5 opens room higher. Use 100.8–101 as risk reference.",
      "price": 106.5
    },
    {
      "symbol": "UNIONBANK",
      "signal": "Buy on dips 146–147",
      "reason": "PSU bank momentum day with strong participation; buying closer to 146–147 offers better risk-reward. Risk reference near 141.",
      "price": 148.67
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "signal": "Hold/Add on strength > 427.5",
      "reason": "Closed near high with solid range expansion; a push through 427.5 can extend trend. For existing holding, trail risk near 412.",
      "price": 426.1
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "signal": "Hold/Trail",
      "reason": "Recovered from an intraday shakeout and closed strong; trail protective stop near 2390–2350 to lock gains.",
      "price": 2479.0
    },
    {
      "symbol": "NAVINFLUOR",
      "signal": "Buy pullback 5600–5650",
      "reason": "Strong range expansion and firm close; prefer entries on shallow retracements rather than chasing highs. Risk reference ~5480.",
      "price": 5687.4
    },
    {
      "symbol": "HAL",
      "signal": "Buy on dips 4650–4680",
      "reason": "Defence momentum intact with steady higher-lows; buy-the-dip setup with risk reference ~4580.",
      "price": 4679.8
    },
    {
      "symbol": "NHPC",
      "signal": "Accumulate 84–85",
      "reason": "Tight consolidation near support; accumulation zone with defined risk below 82.9 for a carry move.",
      "price": 84.84
    },
    {
      "symbol": "KPITTECH",
      "signal": "Breakout watch > 1181",
      "reason": "Narrow-range day near recent highs; breakout above 1181 can trigger momentum continuation.",
      "price": 1166.7
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Hold/Add on close > 273.5",
      "reason": "Inside-to-up potential; only add on a decisive close above 273.5 to confirm momentum. Risk guide ~262.",
      "price": 270.49
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Hold with tight risk",
      "reason": "Weak close toward day low after a strong week; keep a tight guard—below 940 consider trimming; above 972 strength resumes.",
      "price": 953.65
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 6942.2,
    "total_value": 26475.85,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00, LTP 2479.00",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 266.26, LTP 270.49",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 412.80, LTP 426.10",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05, LTP 953.65",
      "INDUSTOWER: 5 units @ 361.55, LTP 363.60",
      "Cash: ₹6942.20"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU banks leadership: UNIONBANK, IDBI, UCOBANK, IOB, CENTRALBK showed relative strength; maintain positive bias on dips.",
    "Defence complex resilient: BEL, HAL, GRSE, BEML steady; treat as buy-on-dips within trend.",
    "FMCG/Consumption soft: DABUR, VBL, JUBLFOOD, MARICO weak—avoid fresh longs until strength returns.",
    "IT mixed-to-weak: MPHASIS saw heavy selling; COFORGE soft—wait for stabilization before entries.",
    "Chemicals bifurcated: NAVINFLUOR strong range expansion; DEEPAKNTR subdued—prefer the leader.",
    "Hospitals mixed: APOLLOHOSP and FORTIS softer; MAXHEALTH slipped—await base formation.",
    "Power/utilities steady: NHPC/SJVN tight ranges; TORNTPOWER firm—watch for breakouts.",
    "Realty mixed: OBEROIRLTY firm; PRESTIGE mild decline—stock-specific approach.",
    "Exchanges/brokers: BSE strong close; CDSL soft; MCX elevated—avoid chasing MCX highs.",
    "Telecom infra: INDUSTOWER consolidating; watch > 371 for momentum resumption.",
    "Airports/logistics: GMRAIRPORT closed weak; DELHIVERY under pressure—avoid until reversal signals.",
    "Risk/positioning: With limited cash, prioritize 1–2 high-conviction adds (e.g., IDBI breakout or NHPC accumulate) and trail stops on winners.",
    "Data note: Received 130 tickers in today’s file; insights are based on the provided set."
  ]
}
